title: (x) Festival '78 - custom drawn {Yves}
content:
hello!

im looking for the font that this was started with. i know its been customized to a degree, but im just looking for the starting point. much thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221212103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/herb_lubalin_064.gif)
author: justinthomaskay

comments.content: There's not necessarily an existing typeface as a starting point. Some logos are designed from scratch, and this sure looks like one.
i feel like it was started with something in the vein of cooper italic... but there's quite a bit different about it. it might just be totally custom.
I think for something like this, the starting point would have been some kind of drug, rather than a font. :-)
FWIW, I agree with Yves that it probably wasn't based a specific font and was done from scratch.
